Sentencas: The sintering behavior of La1-xSrxMnO3(LSM) was studied using porous electrodes of various compositions.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: Radii of particles at the surface, radii of imprints at the interface, and number of imprints per unit area were determined by SEM after heat treatment.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: Grain growth occurred mainly in the initial stage, and was suppressed by slow mass transfer in the successive stage.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: The activation energy of grain growth was calculated to be approximately 400 kJ/mol.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: The relationship between the particle radii of the bulk electrode and the length of three-phase-boundary (TPB) at the interface was clarified.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: The overpotential change due to sintering over time was estimated using this relationship.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering

Sentencas: It was suggested that porous LSM electrode can be operated over 100000 h at 800 degrees C without detectable decrease of TPB length.
Titulo: Change of three-phase-boundary length of La1-xSrxMnO3-yttria stabilized zirconia-air by sintering
